com.here.android.mpa.common

Class DiskCacheUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.common.DiskCacheUtility
  • Deprecated. 
    Provided only to help with the transition of pre-v3.4 disk caches to the current version. This class will be removed in a future release.

    @Deprecated
public final class DiskCacheUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for manipulating the disk cache.

    • Method Detail

      • migrate

        public static DiskCacheUtility.MigrationResult migrate(java.lang.String sourcePath,
                                                       java.lang.String destinationPath)
        Deprecated. 
        Migrates disk cache from previous SDK versions to current.
        Parameters:
        sourcePath - Existing disk cache path. If path does not exist, DiskCacheUtility.MigrationResult.FAILED will be returned.
        destinationPath - Destination disk cache path. This should be used as path of MapSettings.setIsolatedDiskCacheRootPath(String, String).
        Returns:
        a DiskCacheUtility.MigrationResult as migration result
